vignette.name: Align Patch Cords
vignette.bodytext: The Auto Align command works on patch cords as well as objects. Auto Align tidies up the patch cord routing and intelligently introduces segments.

ul.li: Select a patch cord you wish to clean up.
Choose Auto Align (command-Y) from the Arrange menu.

Select two or more objects whose connections you wish to clean up. Hold down the shift key to make a multiple discontiguous selection, or hold down the option key (alt on Windows) and drag to select a cluster of nearby patchcords.
Choose Auto Align from the Arrange menu.
